qas.question: What is going to be resumed for vaccinated arrivals?
From when is the quarantine-free entry program resuming?
What is required for the quarantine-free entry program?
What type of arrival must someone be to qualify for the quarantine-free entry program?

paragraphs.context: Government to resume quarantine-free entry program for vaccinated arrivals on 1 February; COVID-19 tests required

qas.question: If you are not fully vaccinated what can you do?

answers.text: can enter Thailand under the Alternative Quarantine scheme

qas.question: Where does the alternative quarantine scheme run?

paragraphs.context: If you are not fully vaccinated you can enter Thailand under the Alternative Quarantine scheme.
